>
[Stole of Civility](/Equipment.aspx?ID=592)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #152: Legacy of the Lost God](/Sources.aspx?ID=23) pg. 75</row>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Woven from swaths of rich brocade silk and embroidered with ancient Azlanti script in golden thread, this stole imparts a noble appearance to even the homeliest of individuals when draped over the shoulders. While wearing a stole of civility, you receive a +2 item bonus to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) with humans or [Make a Request](/Actions.aspx?ID=51) of humans, and a +2 item bonus to [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) checks against humans. The stole also grants you full understanding of the [Azlanti](/Languages.aspx?ID=49) language.
